definitions.definition: To find or learn something for the first time.
definitions.example: Turning the corner, I discovered a lovely little shop. I discovered that they sold widgets.

definitions.definition: To remove the cover from; to uncover (a head, building etc.).

definitions.example: The gust of wind discovered a bone in the sand.

definitions.definition: To create by moving a piece out of another piece's line of attack.
definitions.example: This move discovers an attack on a vital pawn.

definitions.definition: To reveal (information); to divulge, make known.
definitions.example: I discovered my plans to the rest of the team.

definitions.definition: To manifest without design; to show; to exhibit.
